item.title: MRK
item.description: score:170 Chances: Merck & Co., Inc. is a well-established health care company with a strong presence in the pharmaceutical and animal health segments. The company has a diverse portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies, and consumer care products, providing multiple revenue streams.
